definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Who says breakfast has to be boring?
sentences.chinese: 谁说早餐一定是乏味无趣的呢？

sentences.english: Boring white paper? Too commonplace. Let's find something a little more eyecatching.
sentences.chinese: 乏味的白色的纸？太普通了，得找个稍微抢眼的。

sentences.english: Although, only a human mind could invent something as insipid as love.
sentences.chinese: 尽管，只有人类思维才发明得出爱情这般乏味的东西。

sentences.english: Write dull eyes still staring at the dark night to close the.
sentences.chinese: 写写乏味了双眼仍旧盯着漆黑的夜不肯合上。

sentences.english: Farming wow gold in world of warcraft is considered to be one of the most tedious activities.
sentences.chinese: 在魔兽世界养殖谢文东被认为是最乏味的活动之一。

sentences.english: The story creaks along to a dull conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事勉强发展下去，最后达到一个乏味的结局。

sentences.english: Non-resistance to the tedium, however, can make it a lot less painful.
sentences.chinese: 不去抵制单调乏味，可以减轻你的痛苦。

sentences.english: He that can read an meditate will not find his evenings long or life tedious.
sentences.chinese: 会读书思索的人不会感到长夜无聊或生活乏味。

sentences.english: This, I thought, was the panel for me.
sentences.chinese: 我当时觉得这个对我来说是乏味的。

sentences.english: You have boring, and rational, and precised leaders.
sentences.chinese: 也有严肃乏味理智冷静，但又精确全面的领导者。

sentences.english: We are bored by the speaker's tedious talk.
sentences.chinese: 讲演者那冗长乏味的讲话使我们感到厌烦。

sentences.english: This lawyer verbalizes and is rather tedious.
sentences.chinese: 这位律师唠唠叨叨，单调乏味。

sentences.english: His speech was full of milk-and-water platitudes.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲尽是些乏味的老生常谈。

sentences.english: Binns' classes are remarkable only for their utter dreariness .
sentences.chinese: 宾斯的课是学生们所有课程种种最乏味的。

sentences.english: After three days without reading, talk becomes flavorless.
sentences.chinese: 三日不读书，便觉言语乏味。

sentences.english: Something that is too abstract and theoretical can be a bit tedious to listen to for too long.
sentences.chinese: 太抽象和太理论化的冗长演讲，都会显得乏味无趣。

definition: to be weary of/to be fed up with/tedious
bored/to be fed up with/sick and tired of sth
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
to lose all interest in life (idiom)
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
